notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, S.C., D.S., and R.G.; methodology, S.C., F.S., P.G., and M.S.; formal analysis, A.P.S., M.C.D.M., S.C., and G.M.; writing and original draft preparation, S.C., C.C., A.G., and R.G. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
